channel.title: [317] help me!
channel.description:
alright.. I know this probably isn't in the right place.. but I CANNOT FIND A PLACE TO PUT THIS TOPIC!!!
ok. I have a good client and server.. they are supposed to go together.. but every time I go to get on it from the client.. it doesn't work.. it always says error connecting to server.. I have done everything in those tutorials on here... and it still doesn't work!
this is in the GUI.java in the client.... [IMG]http://i360.photobucket.com/albums/oo47/perez048/help-me-2-1.png[/img]
this is also in the GUI.java IN THE CLIENT.. [IMG]http://i360.photobucket.com/albums/oo47/perez048/help-me-3-1.png[/img]
and this is in the server crap.. [sup]there are 3 slots for this..[/sup][sub]well with the[/sub] [code]if (server.equals("***.*.*.*") || server.equals("localhost")) {[/code] [IMG]http://i360.photobucket.com/albums/oo47/perez048/help-me-1.png[/img] do I LEAVE THEM AS, AS? or do I change the ***.*.*.* to my server name... the ***.*.*.* is 127.0.0.1 so..
I can't find anything else that has to do with connecting to eachother.. I've done port forwarding.. no-ip.. ect..
I need to know.. it does NOT work with others.. I can get on to see what it's like and everything.. but no body else has. I had gotten on my other pc, and sent the client over.. and it doesn't work.. but I can get on with no problem.. I want to know how to get it to work with OTHER computers.. WITHOUT the server data!

item.title: [317] help me!
item.dc:creator: @Defile_Pker Defile_Pker
item.description:
@Defile_Pker wrote:

Well, In you Server Files are the ip’s the same.
If it is the base of another server go into client.java search No-Ip.
THen change the old oone to yours.

If not that. then go into server.java sarch no-ip and change that as well.

IF not those then check your server configueration file and see if this is what says.

ClientRequired=0
WorldId=3
ServerPort=43594

Read full topic

item.title: [317] help me!
item.dc:creator: @gamerbug gamerbug
item.description:
@gamerbug wrote:

alright… I know this probably isn’t in the right place… but I CANNOT FIND A PLACE TO PUT THIS TOPIC!!!

ok. I have a good client and server… they are supposed to go together… but every time I go to get on it from the client… it doesn’t work… it always says error connecting to server… I have done everything in those tutorials on here… and it still doesn’t work!

this is in the GUI.java in the client…

this is also in the GUI.java IN THE CLIENT…

and this is in the server crap… [sup]there are 3 slots for this…[/sup][sub]well with the[/sub] if (server.equals("***.*.*.*") || server.equals("localhost")) {

do I LEAVE THEM AS, AS? or do I change the ... to my server name… the ... is 127.0.0.1 so…

I can’t find anything else that has to do with connecting to eachother… I’ve done port forwarding… no-ip… ect…

I need to know… it does NOT work with others… I can get on to see what it’s like and everything… but no body else has. I had gotten on my other pc, and sent the client over… and it doesn’t work… but I can get on with no problem… I want to know how to get it to work with OTHER computers… WITHOUT the server data!

Read full topic
